message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $18,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $18,000 is too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for this product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. To be fair, I can come down to $14,000.  This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
Hi Alice, I understand the product's value, but I have a budget in mind. I could go up to $9,500.  Let me know if that works for you.
